description:
Company: Workspark (www.myworkspark.com)

WorkSpark provides tailored remote administrative and sales assistant services to businesses across various industries. Our dedicated team members handle tasks such as scheduling, customer support, data management, social media, and more — allowing our clients to focus on growth and core business activities. With a commitment to efficiency and flexibility, we empower businesses to achieve their goals while reducing operational burdens and day-to-day tasks.

About WorkSpark:

WorkSpark’s culture is rooted in our core values, which promote an collaborative and inclusive environment where varied perspectives and new ideas are encouraged and celebrated. We are committed to innovation, trustworthiness, working hard, giving back, and being authentic. At WorkSpark, we believe in doing good in the world. Ask us about our non-profit support!

Job Description:

Workspark is seeking a seasoned Senior Sales Executive with a strong background in B2B sales and a proven track record of success. The ideal candidate possesses an existing network of contacts within companies having 50 or more employees and has experience dealing directly with key decision-makers. This role demands a strategic thinker with excellent communication skills, capable of nurturing meaningful relationships with business leaders to drive sales and foster growth. This is a remote, work from home position.

Responsibilities:
• Business Development: Leverage your existing network to introduce Workspark’s solutions to new prospects in the enterprise sector. Develop and implement strategic sales plans to achieve corporate objectives.
• Client Management: Build and maintain strong, long-lasting customer relationships. Understand client needs and offer solutions and support that meet their individual business requirements.
• Market Analysis: Conduct research to identify emerging market trends, customer needs, and the competitive landscape. Use insights to tailor and innovate sales strategies.
• Sales Targets: Achieve growth and hit sales targets by successfully managing your sales pipeline. Prepare sales reports and forecasts for the management team, providing insights into your sales strategies and their effectiveness.
• Collaboration: Work closely with the marketing, product, and customer service teams to ensure a cohesive and integrated approach to sales and customer satisfaction.
• Lead Source Management: Take charge of managing and analyzing lead sources in our CRM system. Your expertise will ensure that every lead is accurately tracked and categorized, providing a clear view of our sales funnel.

Requirements:
• Proven B2B Experience: At least 5 years of experience in B2B sales, particularly in selling to medium to large-sized businesses (50+ employees). A solid track record of meeting or exceeding sales quotas.
• Software: Prior experience with CRMs and the existing ability to network via Linkedin
• Strong Network: Access to a substantial network of professionals within medium to large-sized organizations. Demonstrated ability to communicate, present, and influence credibly and effectively at all levels of the organization.
• Strategic Thinking: Strong business sense and industry expertise. Ability to think strategically and to lead strong sales processes.
• Communication Skills: Excellent mentoring, coaching, and people management skills. Outstanding communication and interpersonal abilities.
• Educational Background: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Sales, or a relevant field.

Compensation:
• A competitive base salary of $70,000 plus a performance-based commission structure.

How to Apply:

Please submit your resume, cover letter, and any relevant sales performance records. We look forward to exploring how your expertise aligns with the needs of our team at Workspark.

Workspark is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $70,000.00 - $110,000.00 per year

Benefits:
• Dental insurance
• Flexible schedule
• Health insurance
• Paid time off
• Work from home

Compensation package:
• Uncapped commission

Schedule:
• 8 hour shift
• Monday to Friday

Travel requirement:
• No travel

Application Question(s):
• Do you have an existing B2B Network?
• Describe what industries your B2B network consists of.

Experience:
• B2B sales: 3 years (Required)

Work Location: Remote
